name: treatment of used Ni-metal hydride battery, pyrometallurgical treatment | used Ni-metal hydride battery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1919/documentation

The multioutput-process " pyrometallurgical treatment NiMH batteries " delivers the co-products "disposal, NiMH batteries‚Äù and " Ni-Co-Fe residues, pyrometallurgical processing NiMH batteries, at plant ". The latter has been replaced by "iron scrap" and is intented to enter the steel production process for secondary steel. ;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



This dataset represents the treatment of NiMH batteries from electric and electronic devices by a pyrometallurgical process.. It includes energy & auxiliary consumption, waste production, emission (to air/to water) production and rough estimations of the efforts for infrastructure & transportation.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data from a European recycling company - used as global average data.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Dismantling, separation of plastic covers, treatment in a static pyrolysis oven.
